embeds.title: __**Garlic-flavoured commands**__
embeds.description: These are a few of the commands that Garlic Bread has to offer. Please do remember that with great power comes great responsibility. Therefore, please __do not abuse__ these *very* *OP* commands of __**mass-destruction**__.

embeds.title: Owo
embeds.description: This bot's most powerful command by far.

fields.name: **Syntax**
fields.value:
> >uwu ***{prompt id}***
... or ...
> >owo ***{prompt id}***

*Note that the prompt id is optional and the default prompt will be sent if no id will be provided.*

embeds.title: Roles
embeds.description: In order to make the Discord experience richer without giving players administrative permissions, this bot gives every use the ability to have a role color and role name of choosing.
